<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ruby Capacitor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2113)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a magical  staff 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You prepared the staff.
</row>

</column>

---

This cluster of unworked ruby is bound to the top of a staff by silver wire. When activated, it adds one temporary charge to the staff. Any spells cast from the staff before the end of the turn expend these charges first. Any unused temporary charges are lost at the end of your turn.

</column>
